1381620.name: Pumpkin Farmer 2
1381620.description:
Welcome to the next installment of Pumpkin Farmer. This DLC will allow you to automatically get the game once it is finished and uploaded. You will be able to continue from where you left off in the previous game.

Story

You found the one responsible for all the missing pumpkins... And you made him angry... Why would you do that????

I guess now you'll have to stop him from destroying everything. In this installment you'll have to find the all seeing pumpkin to find his weakness. Together with your pal, you will have to traverse lands unexplored by humans. Through dangerous trials you will reach it... but at what cost? You'll have to find out.

Game-play

Help Pampoen find the pumpkin that will help save the town and keep the pumpkins from being hoarded and never to be shared again.

Extras
Once again this dlc is being activated early so once it is released then it will be pushed directly to everyone who owns it.
1381620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
